resp = client.searchable_snapshots.mount(
    repository="my_repository",
    snapshot="my_snapshot",
    wait_for_completion=True,
    index="my_docs",
    renamed_index="docs",
    index_settings={
        "index.number_of_replicas": 0
    },
    ignore_index_settings=[
        "index.refresh_interval"
    ],
)
print(resp)
